ModMetaData.name: Pandora: Reborn
ModMetaData.author: InterstellarOrbit
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 0.5 Transforms Rimworld into Pandora.
Dev Team: Creator/XML: InterstellarOrbit XML: Saebbi(Couldn't have done this without him, much thanks :D) Senior Artist: Kasmex Forever(Another person who gave this mod hope in the darkest of times; would'nt be possible without them!) Na'vi Art: Astra VIP: TheSuave(Person who introduced Kasmex into the project) Gun Artist: ShotgunFrenzy(Contracted) Playtesters: Rolandwow,Grillbye,Nilokka,Troy,DEDOK,JohnnyKrosis,ShaheenXC7
